title: sections 8(2) and 25 of the Wildlife Act 1976 (No. 39 of 1976), the Heritage
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Wildlife (Wild Mammals) (Open
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Wildlife (Wild Mammals) (Open 

Seasons) (Amendment) Order 2024. 

(2) The Wildlife (Wild Mammals) (Open Seasons) Orders 2005 to 2012 
and this Order may be cited together as the Wildlife (Wild Mammals) (Open 
Seasons) Orders 2005 to 2024.

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The effect of this Order is to amend the hunting dates for deer.
